patthana16.74:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.74:2.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa.
